items.name: Massa Official Website
items.description: The official website of the Massa blockchain, featuring information about its decentralized infrastructure and innovative Blockclique technology.

items.name: Massa Ecosystem
items.description: Explore the diverse projects and apply for grants to build on the Massa blockchain.

items.name: Massa Community Forum
items.description: Join the community to discuss topics, ask questions, and connect with other Massa users.

items.name: Massa Documentation
items.description: Comprehensive documentation for the Massa blockchain, covering development guides, smart contracts, and network specifications.

items.name: Massa Tokenomics
items.description: Learn about the economic model of the Massa blockchain, including the distribution, staking rewards, and incentives.

items.name: Massa DeWeb
items.description: Explore how the Massa blockchain enables a decentralized web through its innovative architecture and Web3 applications.

items.name: Massa ASC
items.description: Detailed guide on Massa's Automated Smart Contracts (ASC) system, designed to enable decentralized and self-executing contracts.

items.name: Massa Node Installation
items.description: Step-by-step guide on how to install and run a Massa blockchain node, contributing to network security and decentralization.

items.name: Massa Blockclique Research Paper
items.description: Massa research paper on Blockclique: Scaling Blockchains through Transaction Sharding in a Multithreaded Block Graph, detailing their innovative approach to blockchain scalability.

items.name: Massa Explorer
items.description: Explore the Massa blockchain by viewing transactions, blocks, and address data.

items.name: Massa Blockchain Info
items.description: Detailed information on the Massa blockchain, including real-time stats and analytics.

items.name: MassaExplor.io
items.description: A blockchain explorer for Massa, offering detailed insights into blocks, transactions, smart contracts, and addresses.

items.name: Massa Storage Calculator
items.description: Calculate storage costs on the Massa network for your decentralized applications.

items.name: Massa SC Scanner
items.description: A tool to scan and explore smart contracts deployed on the Massa blockchain.

items.name: Massa Dart SDK
items.description: Massa Dart SDK is a package for developers to interact with the Massa blockchain using the Dart programming language.

items.name: MassAdoption
items.description: A resource hub for adopting Massa technologies and expanding knowledge.

items.name: MassaWallet
items.description: Access and manage your Massa wallet, track balances, and send tokens.

items.name: Bearby
items.description: Bearby is a browser extension wallet for the Massa blockchain, providing users with a secure and easy way to interact with decentralized applications.
